Uses of Interface
com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.IMessageListener

  • Packages that use IMessageListener 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform
    Provides the basic framework for sharing data within or between JVMs.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging
    Provides a framework for sending and receiving messages.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.dual
    Provides ability to send and receive messages to and from both within a JVM instance and between JVM instances.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.centralized

    • Uses of IMessageListener in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging

      Methods in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging with parameters of type IMessageListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean AbstractMessageReceiver.addMessageListener(IMessageListener listener) 
      boolean IMessageReceiver.addMessageListener(IMessageListener listener)
      Arrange to have the given listener called when new data state is received.
      boolean AbstractMessageReceiver.removeMessageListener(IMessageListener listener) 
      boolean IMessageReceiver.removeMessageListener(IMessageListener listener)
      Remove the given listener instance so that it is now longer called when new data is received.
